I am the oldest customer but now facing lot of issues from renowned amazon organization.. either I receive torn food packets or missing products everytime I buy. I have to think twice when I buy ... I belong to city area but now living in a village because of some circumstances, I thought flipkart amazon would work here as they show serviceable to my pincode unlike zomato Swiggy. so I tried flipkart groceries but they clearly mention no service continue......

amazon used to be a great service. now they are the worst. If you have any issue with a product, it is impossible to contact customer support. Their help topics and videos mention a "Chat with us" or " Get a call" but the buttons/ links for these simply don't exist, neither on the app, nor on their website. Rufus is a joke and isn't intended for troubleshooting, I suspect. They have partnered with delivery and pick-up agents who will cancel deliveries and pickups whimsically.

Customer care used to help me alot before but now they are complete trash, doesn't even solved my problem of refund and also delivery boy called me for 10 minutes continuously while my hand was busy, and when I was finally free I called him multiple times but he didn't recieve. and he returned the product stating I rejected. what a joke they made of me when I was the one looking forward to it the whole day, and just because I was busy for 10 minutes, he didn't wait or even tried next day.

Very disappointed recently. Nowadays, Amazon takes too long to get items shipped and thus taking too much time to deliver items even though I subscribed Prime.

My experience with Amazon has become untenable for the following reasons: Delivery Process: The service standard has deteriorated sharply; orders are frequently delayed or cancelled unilaterally. Tracking: Shipment updates are now erratic and cannot be trusted. Customer Support: This is the worst support experience in the online shopping sector. The team is never helpful and refuses to resolve valid escalations. Pricing: The value proposition is gone. Products are consistently overpriced

All guys be watchful with "Pay Later" service. The order placed when the Amazon App was not even installed on my phone. I received the message & installed the app to confirm. Yes the order was placed and there was no cancellation option. Customer care saying, I or my family availed it. I live with old parents, the phone was with me, the app was not installed. Still order placed. I had to pay deducted money to unsubscribe the "pay later" and they are taking 10 days. Is it internal fraud?

Today i realised how Amazon big this much big company. This is a beggar's company. I bought one product and requested for return but almost 1.5 months it not picked up and Amazon mentioned that i should courier to seller but previously it mentioned that in this week not picked up then auto refund will be initiated. If i courier to seller then who will give me courier money? Finally my 1300/- eaten by Amazon.

The Amazon app itself is good and offers N number of products, but the there is issue with the after sales service. In the recent updates, they have hidden 'chat with us' and 'call me' options from the app and made impossible to reach the support. 1 day delivery items are rarely getting delivered on the next day and has become a joke. The delivery guys are unprofessional (also kaamchor), they're giving missed call for less than 1 second and then marking the items undeliverable.

am extremely disappointed with the service quality. This has happened multiple times: Delivery to the wrong address even after providing the correct details. Rude behavior from delivery staff, followed by repeated ‚Äúsorry sir‚Äù without any real solution. No proper customer support even after raising complaints. No benefits or compensation, despite delays, errors, and inconvenience. Although I have taken the premium subscription, I still do not receive any vouchers, benefits, or priority service.

So I waited till the next day and after i saw the they're telling that we will refund your amount but laptop won't come...So Amazon started taking there own decision. Hate you.
